summary: FUEL LINE RUBBED ON AC LINE AND WORE THROUGH PLASTIC COVER AND HOSE  WAS LEAKING GAS.  DEALER SAID THAT THE LINE WAS ON BACK ORDER FROM MANUFACTURER.  ON NEW MODEL THERE IS A CLIP TO LOCATE THE LINE AWAY FROM OTHER PARTS.  A CHECK OF A FRIENDS CAR SHOWS WEAR TO THE PLASTIC COVER ALSO.  SINCE THIS COULD CAUSE A FIRE, I THINK CARS SHOULD BE CHECKED FOR WEAR AND REPAIRED BY CHRYSLER.   *JB    ***DIMSII IVOQ ENTRY POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****760343***
